docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 8 (AP) -- A record of babies born out of wedlock -- more than 200,000 a year -- has renewed the controversy over ebbing standards of American morality and the resulting burden on United States taxpayers.

headline.main: ILLEGITIMACY RISE ALARMS AGENCIES; Aid vs. Punishment Debate Flares as the Rate Jumps Among Teen-Agers

docs.abstract: Mrs Oettinger discusses rise in illegitimacy and various proposed remedies; opposes punishing unwed mother
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 8 (AP) -- A record of babies born out of wedlock -- more than 200,000 a year -- has renewed the controversy over ebbing standards of American morality and the resulting burden on United States taxpayers.

docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 7 -- Queen Elizabeth II is expecting her third child early next year. An official announcement issued this afternoon from Buckingham Palace stated: "The Queen will undertake no further public engagements."

headline.main: Elizabeth II Is Expecting Third Child Next Winter; QUEEN ELIZABETH EXPECTING A CHILD

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 7 -- Queen Elizabeth II is expecting her third child early next year. An official announcement issued this afternoon from Buckingham Palace stated: "The Queen will undertake no further public engagements."
